paudgalika anshaya sambandhayen katayuthu karana loka banku aayathanayak wana antharjathika mulya sahayogitha aayathanaya, lowa sanwardhanaya wemin pawathina ratawal 100ka pamana kriyathmaka wemin ugath padam padaka karaganimin ek ek ratawala sanwardhana gatalu wisandima sandaha madihath wemin sitiyi. 1956 wasare di ehi aarambhaye di ma shri lankawa antharjathika mulya sahayogitha aayathanaye samajikathwaya laba gath athara me dakwa kalaya thula a.do. biliyana 1.3 dayakathwayak rata wenuwen ema aayathanayen labi atha.

me kale sabhapathithuma wideshagatha une maseka pudgalika charikawakata.wada balanna palaka mandalayen kenek path unath samastha paripalana wagakima mata pawaruna.eka dawasak dawal karyalaye inna kota ethana thibunu jathika madyasthane sahakara adhyaksha bandula mahaththaya mata kathakarala kiwwa aayathanayata ayithi idama kamkarudepartha menthuwe kattiyak awith eli peheli karanawa kiyala.ayi ee aya aayathanaye idamata awith thiyenne kiyala ahuwama sewaka arthasadaka aramudale godanagilla hadanna idama sakas karannayi kiyala kiyanawa kiwwa.wahama eeaya iwath karana lesath apa aayathanayata ayath depalata athulu wimen walakina lesath danwana lesa ohuta pawasuwa.bandula sahakara adhyaksha thuma wahama kamkaru departhamenthuwe ayawa iwathkara.ohun bandulata doskiya iwath una bawa mata dannuwa.kamkaru departhamenthuwa pradhanin me karanaya barapathala widiyata salakuwa.niyojya komasariswarayek bandula sahakara adhyaksha thumata kathakara thaman athulu wi katayuthukala idama kamkaru departhamenthuwata ayath bawath wruthiya puhunu adhikariya ema idamen thama niladharin iwath kirima barapathala waradak bawath pawasa thibuna.mema idama narahenpita jathika wruthiya puhuna madhyasthanayata yabadawa pawathunu his bhumiyak.jathika puhunu madhyasthanaye mayim wata thula me idama thibuna.mama kamkarudeparthamenthuwen adhikariyata anuyukthawu parani sewakayin gen me idama gana thorathuru wimasuwa.me idama kamkaru departhamenthuwata ayathwa thibu wadamulikayin puhunu kirime aayathanayata ayathwa thibu bawath wruthiya puhunu adhikariya parlimenthu panathakin sthapitha karaddi wadamulikayin puhunu kirime aayathanaya ha kamkarudeparthamenthuwe minisbala anshaya nawa adhikariyata ek kala bawath ohun pawasuwa.parani wadamulikayin puhunu kirime aayathanaya nawa adhikariya yatathe jathika wruthiya puhunu madhyasthanaya narahenpita lesa namkara athi bawath danagaththa.wadamulikayin puhunu kirime aayathanayata adala minindoru sithiyama balimedi aayathanaya saha me prashnagatha idama ekama idamak lesa pawathina bawath penuna.

arakku kalak ganna mudalata ra bothal dekak bonna puluwan.bar eka arinna oona ude 9.00 ta unath wathukaraye bar ude indalama arinawa.samaharu ude hayata dorata thattu karanawa.dawasakata eka bar ekaka ra bothal 400 k withara wikinenawa.sathiyakata eka bar ekakata ra loriyak dekak banawamayi.loriyaka bothal 1500 k genawa.thunwela kanawa wage bona ayath innawa.raththaran badu,ayidi kad,banku poth,fon thiyala samaharu bonawa.mama bar eken ayinwenakotath eeke ayi.di 15 k withara thibuna.podi ayata badu denne nathinisa wathuwala podi lamayi tawume natamilata kiyak hari dila arakku ra gannawa.me wasangathaya dan ape janathawa sahena durata winashakarala.barwala bothal kadala lus wikunanna thahanam.eeth wathukaraye barwalata ee nithi walangu naha.bothal kadala wakkarala widuru ganata denawa.eeken bar ekata labhayi.
